headline.print_headline: Trump Students Cite Push to Give Positive Reviews
headline.main: At Trump University, Students Recall Pressure to Give Positive Reviews

lead_paragraph: Ex-students say coercive tactics were used to elicit glowing marks for Donald J. Trump’s real estate classes in evaluations he is now using against them.
snippet: Ex-students say coercive tactics were used to elicit glowing marks for Donald J. Trump’s real estate classes in evaluations he is now using against them....
abstract: Class-action lawsuit filed against Trump University alleges that former students were coerced into giving positive reviews of courses in order to obtain graduation certificates; Donald Trump has vowed to fight litigation against school, including lawsuit from New York State's attorney general; controversy has taken unexpectedly strong role in 2016 Republican presidential primary race.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and STEVE EDER
